posts.title: Hexo Using
posts.text: introductionThis blog is aim to introduce how to install and use hexo. hexo basic123456789101112# clean public$ hexo clean# generate$ hexo g# local server$ hexo s# deploy$ hexo d# new page$ hexo new page --path zone/about "about" # new page in source/zone/about.md title is "about"$ hexo new --path zone/about "about" # new page in _post/zone/about.md title is "about"$ hexo new "about" # new page in _post/about.md
